text: he daood! hamane tujhe raajy diya hai dharatee mein. atah, nirnay kar, logon ke beech saty (nyaay) ke saath tatha anusaran na kar aakaanksha ka. anyatha, vah kupath kar degee tujhe allaah kee raah se. nihsandeh, jo kupath ho jaayenge allaah kee raah[1] se, to unheen ke lie ghor yaatana hai, is kaaran ki ve bhool gaye haî€¼isaab ka din
